book.title: The Narrative of the Life of Frederick Douglass
book.description: 简介： In the month of August, 1841, I attended an anti-slavery convention in Nantucket, at which it was my happiness to become acquainted with Frederick Douglass, the writer of the following Narrative. He was a stranger to nearly every member of that body;...
